cause.description:
This has been going on for quite a while and we should just let bygons be bygons with the beard and lift the sanction on Cuba since we are no longer fighting communism.
1. Lift the economic embargo/sanction on Cuba.
2. Establish friendly ties with the country.
cause.mission: Lift the embargo on Cuba so we can smoke them cigarros.
cause.name: LEAGALIZE CUBAN CIGARS
